title: shared resources
extract: Shared LAN points are used by a variety of system resources, such as hard drives, printers, scanners and network cards. File and printer sharing occur via two network communication mechanisms: peer-to-peer (P2P) sharing and the client-server network model.
extract_html: Shared LAN points are used by a variety of system resources, such as hard drives, printers, scanners and network cards. File and printer sharing occur via two network communication mechanisms: peer-to-peer (P2P) sharing and the client-server network model.
